sentences.sContent: Katie had drawn a cottage with a little stream running next to it.
sentences.sCn: 凯蒂画了一间小茅舍，旁边流淌着一条小溪。

sentences.sContent: She asked the little girl to draw a picture of the man she’d spoken to.
sentences.sCn: 她让小女孩把刚才和她说话的那个男人画出来。

sentences.sContent: Keith was drawing a complicated-looking graph.
sentences.sCn: 基思在画一张看上去很复杂的图表。

sentences.sContent: I’ve never been able to draw very well.
